description: Wild ginger (Asarum splendens 'Quicksilver') is an amazing plant species. Its lush, evergreen foliage provides an attractive contrast to its deep maroon-colored blooms. Its unique feature is its striking silver-gray foliage, which creates a beautiful color contrast within the garden. Its low maintenance requirements and hardy nature make wild ginger the ideal choice for even novice gardeners. Its ability to grow in shade or part shade makes it versatile enough to fit into just about any garden. It's also a great way to attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies to the garden. Wild ginger is a stunning plant species that is sure to add beauty and color to any garden.
